summary: Changes the textures on the Ancient Falmer/Ivory armor to black with light grey cloth/ accents
descriptionHtml:
I delved into Dawnguard's texture's and found the Ancient Falmer armor after a long search. I then proceeded to fiddle with it until i got it nice and black, just how i wanted.
big thanks to Nozi87 for the video review!
[youtube]zVYnUzFIp70[/youtube]

Dawnguard is REQUIRED for the Ancient Falmer armor

----Install----
Now Mod Manager friendly!
To install follow the file path and create the necessary folders, then drop in the textures, if you get confused ill make a video.
If for some reason you want to go back to using the original Bethesda textures, you need only delete this texture and it should revert to using the originals.
If you have a problem with the mod please either leave a comment in the comments section describing your issue, or send me a message.

I've uploaded some more pictures without any mods running, (that's why my female character doesn't have any hair, its not an issue with these textures) as well as some of a male character without any mods running. Just to be clear, I edited these textures with a completely un-modded version of Skyrim.
author: Capokid
